entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 5 except minus 11 inland.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5 except minus 11 inland. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning then northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 March 2023
